issue.title: [Rust] Broken links and other documentation warnings
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5184](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5184). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There are several broken links and other documentation warnings (when running 'cargo doc') in the Rust implementation of Arrow and Parquet.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5184?focusedCommentId=16821401) by Chao Sun (csun):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4172
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4172>

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5184?focusedCommentId=16821404) by Chao Sun (csun):*
`[~andygrove]` could you add [~jblondin@gmail.com] to the contributor list so we can assign this JIRA to him? Thanks.
